ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia heard the news, he didn t like the flying lizard but right now he seemed the logical choice. Phobia thought he could lead better than Terrasaur but

Phobia heard the news, he didn't like the flying lizard but right now 
he seemed the logical choice. Phobia thought he could lead better 
than Terrasaur but hadn't functioned for so long by taking the 
leadership responsibilities. His place was at the leaders side, and 
when that leader had worn out it's usefullness the spider would 
weasle his way into the next ones side.

"A fine choice he told KitKat." And since Terrasaur had decided to 
travel with Terantulis then the others should follow, at least until 
KitKat recovered.

Phobia turned to Terantulis, he knew the other spiders reputation all 
to well they were to alike not to. "It's a pleasure to meet a bot 
with such a wonderful beast mode." he said. Those were the only 
appropriate words he could think of. Phobia could think of alot of 
other things he'd like to say but none seemed appropriate at this 
time.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She lifted her head. "Terrorsaur will lead. He..he.." she dropped 
her 
> head and fell unconsious. She body shook uncontrolably and her 
> breathing was very labored.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Phobia somehow fealt responsible for all this, There were a 
million
> > different things going through his head. "How could I have been so
> > stupid?"(Please no comments from the peanut gallery) He knew he 
> should have
> > paid more attention to who was boarding his ship. His attempt at 
> being a
> > hero blew up in his face and it cost KitKat some serious damage
> > 
> > 
> > Phobia turned and saw the injured Starscream. "I'm alright but we 
> must get
> > to a secure area." He watched as Starscream collapsed again. 
Maybe 
> something
> > good could come of this situation after all.
> > 
> > 
> > "Theres only one fair way to do this and since the Predacons 
rairly 
> settle
> > for diplomacy I say we have KitKat name her successor."
> > There was a time for diplomacy in the Predacon ranks and that was
> to 
> size up
> > your opponent until they turned thier back.
> > 
> > Phobia knew the rules all to well. Starscream could be more 
heavily 
> damaged
> > than they realized that would make him to much a liability, Dollen
> > Goldeneye, and Drillbit were to close to this emotionally to 
allow 
> the
> > decisions that could lead to sacrificeing one of the teamates, 
Atma 
> seemed
> > to have some personal grudge against Drillbit making him 
> unacceptable as the
> > leader.
> >

> KitKat is
